title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 374 - Tax Refund Offset For Overpayments Of Public Assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 374 - Tax Refund Offset For Overpayments Of Public Assistance

State Regulations
§ 374.0 - Scope
§ 374.1 - Withholding of State tax overpayments
§ 374.2 - Notice
§ 374.3 - Defenses
§ 374.4 - Review and determination by the department

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 2, pt. 374

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 106- c, 131[l], 158[a], 355[3]; L. 1995, ch. 81

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
